means: 形态学（尤指动植物形态学或词语形态学）

word_mean: 形态学：描述生物形态和结构的科学
一特定机体器官或部分的外形与结构

sentence.Network_en: Morpheme is the basic unit in the study of morphology.
sentence.Network_cn: 词素是形态学研究的最基本的单位。

sentence.Network_en: No longer can biologists be content simply to study morphology.
sentence.Network_cn: 生物学家不再满足于简单地研究形态学.

sentence.Network_en: They attain complex morphology, appearing as branched, tubular processes.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们达到复杂的形态, 出现分枝, 管状突起.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 从形态学（Morphology）上来说，应该把它看成一个词缀（affix），或是一个后缀（suffix）更加合适，因为“党”字并不是个独立的词…
词字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 词典〖 dictionary〗 词法〖 morphology〗 词赋〖 atypeofclassicalChinesewriting〗.
...发现会出现典型由肠病毒所致的细胞病变,cytopathetic effect,CPE,现象,由电子显微镜下观察其形态,morphology,及物理化学,physicochemical,特性都与当时已知的其他肠病毒类似,但进行中和抗体试验.
型态(morphology) 至少有30所的精子型态为正常生命力(vitality) 至少有75%为活的精子白血球(white blood cell) 每毫升精液中少于.

entry.def: The morphology of something is its form and structure. In linguistics, morphology refers to the way words are constructed with stems, prefixes, and suffixes.

means.word_mean: 1. the branch of biology that deals with the structure of animals and plants
2. studies of the rules for forming admissible words
3. the admissible arrangement of sounds in words
4. the branch of geology that studies the characteristics and configuration and evolution of rocks and land forms

auth_sentence.content: Mimicry may involve morphology, behavior, and other properties.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mimicry may involve morphology, behavior, and other properties.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mimicry may involve morphology, behavior, and other properties.

auth_sentence.content: It might equally have to do with morphology or other factors.
auth_sentence.res_content: It might equally have to do with morphology or other factors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It might equally have to do with morphology or other factors.

auth_sentence.content: But it has many more traits that belong with reptilian morphology.
auth_sentence.res_content: But it has many more traits that belong with reptilian morphology.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But it has many more traits that belong with reptilian morphology.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 多形的, 多态的, 多形态的

anthropo人+morph形+ous的→adj.有人形的,似人的
